welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ezanville, a charming city known for its quaint streets, delicious cuisine, and rich history. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and experiencing all that our city has to offer. Bon voyage!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for commercial flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into seven sub-terminals (2A to 2G) serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, mainly serving low-cost airlines and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster connection speeds.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
